content: A sexagesimal system was used in Babylonia. Therefore an hour has sixty minutes and a day has twenty-four hours.
translations: tur:Altmışlık sayı sistemi Babil devletinde uygulandı, bunun sonucunda bir saatte 60 dakika ve günde 24 saat var
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by ytugen (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
